    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Bishop
    Represents a Bishop chess piece.
    Board
    Represents an 8x8 chess board with pieces.
    Game
    Manages the chess game flow, including turn management, check/checkmate detection, and overall game state.
    King
    Represents a King chess piece.
    Knight
    Represents a Knight chess piece.
    Main
    Main entry point for the Console-based Chess Game.
    Pawn
    Represents a Pawn chess piece.
    Piece
    Abstract base class representing a chess piece.
    Player
    Represents a chess player.
    Position
    Represents a position on the chess board using row and column indices.
    Queen
    Represents a Queen chess piece.
    Rook
    Represents a Rook chess piece.
    Utilities
    Utility class providing helper methods for chess notation conversion and validation.
